Edward Chiwawa (a mụrụ n'afọ 1935) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
A mụrụ ya n'ebe ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Guruve
Ọ mụtara ịkpụ ihe site n'iso nwa nwanne nna ya bụ Henry Munyaradzi rụọ ọrụ
Site na 1971 ruo 1973 ọ bụ onye bi na Tengenenge Sculpture Community
A na-ahụkarị ihe ọkpụkpụ ya nke ọma
Chiwawa egosila na Europe na Australia.
